statements: DELETE FROM ConflictResolutionTimeline WHERE dispute_id = 1 AND resolution_deadline < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM ConflictResolutionTask WHERE task_deadline < '2023-06-15' AND timeline_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Deadlines WHERE deadline_name = 'ProjectA Deadline';
DELETE FROM dispute_parties WHERE case_id = 100 AND party_role = 'Plaintiff';
DELETE FROM dispute_deadlines WHERE case_id = 100 AND resolution_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM resolution_history WHERE result = 'Resolved' AND case_id = 200;
DELETE FROM ConflictTimeline WHERE id = 100 AND start_date < '2022-10-01';
DELETE FROM TimelineEvents WHERE event_date < '2023-01-01' AND id = 200
